overview: An old man wanders through dreams and reality as he strives to find that spark of youth he once had. Routine is everything and his life is a grey mist, trapped in a job that he hates and stuck with a wife who no longer loves him. As he dreams away he's starting to put the pieces together. Past and present intertwine as he returns to that one haven he for a long time only thought he'd dreamed up.
title: When the Radio Dies
